title: New: Shinies – Spent Youth
body:
Remember when **Kaiser Chiefs** used to re-release every single a minimum of 32 times, even though they all sounded exactly the same? Well this ‘new’ track from Manchester’s **Shinies** is sort of like that, albeit only their second version of it… oh and it’s not shit either.

In fact, the decision to re-record is pretty understandable when you consider that the demo of _Spent Youth_ was recorded on a limb and inside their own modest budget. Having seen **Shinies** play in Newcastle a week or two back, I can wholeheartedly confirm that _Spent Youth_ is as ballbusting live as on record, with it’s sexual frustration and jilted teenage angst. Check it out below.
